user.activity.note.accessReader: Click on the + sign close to your name to play
user.activity.message.readinglog.full.wi: You have won a prize for reading for 10 hours. Please visit your local San José Public Library to claim your prize. If you would like to continue reading, click +20.
user.activity.message.readinglog.full: If you would like to continue reading, click +20.
user.activity.message.activityGrid.instr: Complete any 4 squares in a row (vertical, horizontal, or diagonal) to win prizes. Visit your local San José Public Library once your prize is ready to claim!
user.activity.message.activityGrid.rowOr: You have won a prize for completing activities in a row/column. Please visit your local San José Public Library to claim your prize.
user.activity.message.activityGrid.black: You have won a prize for completing all the activities. Please visit your local San José Public Library to claim your prize.
